fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • We misspelled the English peak of Scafell Pike as Scarfell Pike (Trust buys site in Lake District revered by Turner, 5 June, page 19). • The caption of an 1854 picture of Queen Victoria and Prince Albert said it was taken five years after their marriage. That should have been 14 years as they married in 1840 (Prince Albert kept babies coming so he could be king in all but name – Worsley, 31 May, page 25). Other recently corrected articles include: Peterborough prepares for byelection that could elect first Brexit party MP Chernobyl finale review – when the dust settles, it will be considered a classic
